requirement: This code is intended to implement a check to determine whether there are any elevator stop requests between a specified start floor and end floor in a given direction.
provide_code:
FUNCTION F_CheckJobInDirection : BOOL
VAR_INPUT
	nStartFloor		:	USINT;		//起始楼层
	nEndFloor		:	USINT;		//结束楼层
	bIncreasing		:	BOOL;		//TRUE=向上检查（递增），FALSE=向下检查（递减）
END_VAR
